T02TD3062E:117b-0: @117b / snying po'i sngags la sogs pa bstan pa ni bum pa lhag @118a * //
T02TD3062E:117b-1: gar padma 'dab ma brgyad kyi steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la h'um nag po rnam par bsams te /
T02TD3062E:117b-2: de'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha'i phyogs su bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD3062E:117b-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i khro chen gtum po 'gugs shing yang dag bar mchod cing ;
T02TD3062E:117b-5: phyis mi byed par sdom pa dang /
T02TD3062E:117b-6: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02TD3062E:117b-7: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD3062E:117b-9: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD3062E:117b-14: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms la /
T02TD3062E:117b-15: 'gro ba dngos med kyi rang bzhin gzung ba dang /
T02TD3062E:117b-18: rmi lam lta bur rtogs shing stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3062E:117b-19: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyham zhes so //
T02TD3062E:117b-20: de'i rjes la nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i phyogs su padma 'dab ma brgyad kyi steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la h'um nag po las skyes shing //
T02TD3062E:117b-21: yu ba la h'um gis mtshan pa'i ral gri de'i 'od zer rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs ma lus pa bkug cing rab tu zhugs so //
T02TD3062E:117b-22: de nas h'om las byung ba bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i me 'bar ba'i phreng ba can //
T02TD3062E:117b-23: bdud gdul bar dka' ba rnam par 'dul bar byed pa sprin sngon po chen po lta bu'i lus can rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02TD3062E:117b-24: rin po ches sbras pa'i cod pan gyi gtsug phud lngas gsal bar byas la /
T02TD3062E:117b-25: gzhon nu ma bsdigs pha rol par gyur pa'i me tog kun da lta bu'i ya sos ma mchu mnan pas gdug pa la bsdigs pa dang /
T02TD3062E:117b-26: 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs kyi dpal dang ldan pa /
T02TD3062E:117b-27: khro gnyer dang so che bar mthong ba lta bu /
T02TD3062E:117b-28: spyan gnyis kyis cig car sa bla dang /
T02TD3062E:117b-29: sa 'og 'jigs par byed pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor la g-yas pa'i pus mos mnan pa /
T02TD3062E:117b-30: sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i gdan la 'dug pa'i zhabs g-yon pas bzhengs par 'dod pa /
T02TD3062E:117b-31: phyag g-yas pa'i dkyil du h'um gis mtshan pa'i ral gri sngon po 'bar ba bsnams pa /
T02TD3062E:117b-32: g-yon pas sdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs par byas pa'i khyab 'jug dang /
T02TD3062E:118b-0: @118b gser gyi snying po la sogs pa dang /
T02TD3062E:118b-1: nyon mongs kyi tshogs kyi dgra dpag tu med pa 'khrugs pa bcings pa la rdo rjes mtshan pa'i gser gyi zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02TD3062E:118b-2: 'gro ba'i 'dod pa mtha' yas pa phun sum tshogs pa sbyin pa la ro gcig pa dpal ldan khro chen gtum po bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3062E:118b-3: bcom ldan 'das khro chen rgyal po mi g-yo ba'i snying gar padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um las byung zhing dkyil du h'um gis mtshan pa'i ral gri yongs su gyur pas khro chen gtum po gnyis pa snying gi nang na gnas pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD3062E:118b-4: yang de'i snying gar padma dang nyi ma la gnas shing h'um las skyes pa'i ral gri nag po dkrongs pa dkyil du h'um gis mtshan pa bsgom mo //
T02TD3062E:118b-5: de'i 'od kyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug cing dam tshig sems dpa' bzhin du bltas la /
T02TD3062E:118b-8: bsang gtor la sogs pa phul nas /
T02TD3062E:118b-9: h'um yig gis de kho nar rab tu bzhugs te /
T02TD3062E:118b-11: ho: yig gis dgyes par bya'o //
T02TD3062E:118b-12: chu la chu bzhin du gcig tu gyur pa'i 'dren pa po bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3062E:118b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan gnyis dang /
T02TD3062E:118b-18: thugs rnams la go rims ji lta bar rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD3062E:118b-23: bdag med ma rnams yan lag drug la bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD3062E:118b-24: snying la gnas pa'i h'um las spros pa'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo'i tshogs bkug cing /
T02TD3062E:118b-25: bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pa rnams kyis khrus bya ste /
T02TD3062E:118b-26: spyi bor mi bskyod pa bsgoms la /
T02TD3062E:118b-27: lha mo rnams kyis gar dang rol mo la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
T02TD3062E:118b-28: mchod pa la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis dgyes par bya'o //
T02TD3062E:118b-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das gzhan don la brtson pa po sems can thams cad chags sdang dang /
T02TD3062E:118b-30: gti mug la sogs pa dang /
T02TD3062E:119a-0: chags pa'i dra bas kyang ma rig pa'i mun pas srid pa'i 'khor @119a * //
T02TD3062E:119a-1: lo la 'khor du 'jug pa de dag blta bar bya'o //
T02TD3062E:119a-2: de nas snying la gnas pa'i sngags las spros pa'i khro chen rgyal po rnams kyis bdud kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'khor dang bcas pa /
T02TD3062E:119a-6: rdo rje'i zhags pas bcings shing bkug ste bsdus nas phye mar byas la /
T02TD3062E:119a-7: ral gri rnon pos dum bur bcas la /
T02TD3062E:119a-8: byams pa'i sems kyis yang sprul nas chos la dgod pa'i ched du rang gi rkang pa'i phyogs su bzhag la /
T02TD3062E:119a-9: bsgo ba las ngal bar gyur na smin mtshams kyi bar du sems bzhag la sngags bzlas par bya'o ;
T02TD3062E:119a-10: / sna tshogs gcig tu gyur pa'i sku can khro chen gtum po sngon po'i sngags bzlas pa tsam gyis /
T02TD3062E:119a-18: de bzhin du bskrad pa dang /
T02TD3062E:119a-21: bsdigs pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3062E:119a-22: khro chen gtum po'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD3062E:119a-23: slob dpon pra bh'a ka ra k'i rtis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD3062E:119a-25: // / thugs rje chen po'i rgyud gsum pa //
T02TD3062E:119a-26: mkhas rtogs 'dzom zhing yi dam mthong //
T02TD3062E:119a-27: spobs pa rtsod pa snyan dang gas mkhas ;
T02TD3062E:119a-28: / sbyin pa tshul khrims kyi rang 'gyur//
